item.description:
We'll be having a potluck lunch at our friend's house in Worcester! Al and Jaymz are a couple of vegans that have come to Maple Farm a number of times and Jaymz cooks like there's no tomorrow! They have some wonderful animal friends living there so we will still be able to give some love. I hope to see all of you with vegan yummies in hand :)

Please park on the street and don't block anyone's drive way. The location is right off of Grafton Street not far from Quan Yin.


If you have any questions you can reach me at 508-459-1074, Meghan at 508-963-0044 or you can email me as well.

See you all soon!!

Stephen
item.how_to_find_us: Dreads, glasses and a whole lot of veganess ;)
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp December Meetup
